title: Emily Ratajkowski on Getting Red Carpet–Ready for Her First Golden Globes
text:
Photo: Courtesy of Emily Ratajkowski / @emrata See more photos of: 
For first-time Golden Globe Awards attendee Emily Ratajkowski, last night was all about high glamour. “I want to feel like myself, but myself on steroids,” said the actress at the ceremony. “I have an idea of how I want to feel and let [my hair and makeup teams and stylist] know.” Ratajkowski knew she wanted to make a major impact, however, which explains her high-wattage choice of Reem Acra’s citrine dress punctuated with crystal embellishments. 
“The tricky part of this dress is the front slit,” she admitted. Any tips, then, on how to perfect a pose on the red carpet? “It’s not an Angie moment!” said Ratajkowski with a laugh, referring to Angelina Jolie’s infamous leg-baring look at the 2012 Academy Awards. “I realized I needed a foot and knee to emerge from the middle.” 
She did, however, have a bit of succinct yet freeing advice to share for first-timers getting dressed for their debuts at awards shows and premieres: “Let that freak flag fly!” 
Here, the actress shares snaps just before she hit the red carpet.
